remarks: Express the predicate ` F ` converges to ` 0 ` .  Similar to ~ clim , but without the disjoint var constraint ` F k ` .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
clim0cf.nf $e |- F/_ k F $.
clim0cf.z $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
clim0cf.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
clim0cf.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. V ) $.
clim0cf.fv $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = B ) $.
clim0cf.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> B e. CC ) $.
clim0cf $p |- ( ph -> ( F ~~> 0 <-> A. x e. RR+ E. j e. Z A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` j ) ( abs ` B ) < x ) ) $.
$d F j x $.
$d M j $.
$d Z j k $.
$d j k ph x $.
